mail_format.subject: Commercial Datalake: HDFS Stats
mail_format.body:
Hi Team,

PFA the HDFS utilization stats for your respective franchises.

Action items:
  • Franchise leads should coordinate with their team to free up the HDFS space as required.
  • Please observe the text input format table in the attached html for your respective franchise and convert them to parquet format tables(Only reference tables are exception of this rule).

Note: This is a system generated mail please do not reply on this mail.

Regards,
ZS Mabi Ops Team
